description: The AWS::ObservabilityAdmin::TelemetryRule resource defines a CloudWatch Observability Admin Telemetry Rule.

ResourceType.description: Resource Type associated with the Telemetry Rule
ResourceType.markdownDescription:
Resource Type associated with the Telemetry Rule

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AWS::EC2::VPC  
Update requires: No interruption

TelemetryType.description: Telemetry Type associated with the Telemetry Rule
TelemetryType.markdownDescription:
Telemetry Type associated with the Telemetry Rule

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Logs  
Update requires: No interruption

Scope.description: Selection Criteria on scope level for rule application
Scope.markdownDescription:
Selection Criteria on scope level for rule application

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SelectionCriteria.description: Selection Criteria on resource level for rule application
SelectionCriteria.markdownDescription:
Selection Criteria on resource level for rule application

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DestinationType.markdownDescription:
Type of telemetry destination

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: cloud-watch-logs  
Update requires: No interruption

DestinationPattern.markdownDescription:
Pattern for telemetry data destination

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

RetentionInDays.description: Number of days to retain the telemetry data in the specified destination
RetentionInDays.markdownDescription:
Number of days to retain the telemetry data in the specified destination

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

VPCFlowLogParameters.description: Telemetry parameters for VPC Flow logs

LogFormat.description: The fields to include in the flow log record. If you omit this parameter, the flow log is created using the default format.
LogFormat.markdownDescription:
The fields to include in the flow log record. If you omit this parameter, the flow log is created using the default format.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

TrafficType.description: The type of traffic captured for the flow log. Default is ALL
TrafficType.markdownDescription:
The type of traffic captured for the flow log. Default is ALL

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxAggregationInterval.description: The maximum interval of time, in seconds, during which a flow of packets is captured and aggregated into a flow log record. Default is 600s.
MaxAggregationInterval.markdownDescription:
The maximum interval of time, in seconds, during which a flow of packets is captured and aggregated into a flow log record. Default is 600s.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

VPCFlowLogParameters.markdownDescription:
Telemetry parameters for VPC Flow logs

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TelemetryDestinationConfiguration.description: The destination configuration for telemetry data
TelemetryDestinationConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The destination configuration for telemetry data

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TelemetryRule.markdownDescription:
The telemetry rule

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RuleName.description: The name of the telemetry rule
RuleName.markdownDescription:
The name of the telemetry rule

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

RuleArn.description: The arn of the telemetry rule
RuleArn.markdownDescription:
The arn of the telemetry rule

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1011  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([a-z0-9\-]+)?:([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+):([a-z0-9\-]+)?:([0-9]{12})?:(.+)$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String
